src.mcp.client module

class src.mcp.client.VidwaanMCPClient(server_script_path: str = 'src/mcp/server.py')[source]

Bases: object

A client for the VidwaanAI MCP Server. Wraps the MCP ClientSession to provide easy access to tools.

async call_tool(name: str, arguments: Dict[str, Any]) → Any[source]

Calls a tool by name with arguments.
